==== Luke Yelavich (TheMuso) ====
==== Accessibility ====
* Quieten all logs by default for speech-dispatcher, to minimize space usage in users home directories. Its easy enough to ask them to enable extra logging if something needs debugging.
* Sponsored a patch for onboard to make desktop files translatable, as well as add a fix to hide onboard menu items, the same as other accessibility tools.
* Continued trying to debug random speech-dispatcher crash, still nowhere near solving it.

==== Audio ====
* Audio bug triaging, bugs in question are against pulseaudio, alsa userspace, and the kernel for hardware enablement.
* Uploaded several fixes relating to volume restoration race conditions, and pulse and alsa bug fixes.
* Added some sounds from the freedesktop sound theme to the ubuntu sound theme to satisfy those whow anted sounds for various message events for empathy. Some still feel that this is not entirely resolved, since the freedesktop theme did not have sounds for everything.
* Uploaded a new casper revision to allign with some pulseaudio changes relating to disabling pulseaudio for accessibility installs from the live CD.
* Did fres installs on systems to do final checks of audio hardware, to make sure things worked out of the box and were usable.

==== Misc ====
* Sponsored a gcalctool upload for RObert.

==== Tony Espy (awe) ====
* Preparation for OEM Audio Requirements call for Lucid; participated in actual call.

* General NetworkManager bug triage
* Worked on Kubuntu Hidden Network bug ( <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/network-manager/+bug/444262|lp:444262]]</nowiki> ).  I can see why it's not working, but don't know the knetwork-manager code well enough to understand how it's supposed to work. 
* Wrote Plumber's Conference trip report.

==== Till Kamppeter (tkamppeter) ====
* Made CUPS 1.4.1 using IP addreeses for broadcasting again, like 1.3.x did, as there are many networks with DNS not correctly working (LP: #449586).
* Made the CUPS 1.4.1 package clearing the CUPS cache on upgrade from older versions (LP: #420490).
* CUPS init script: Made cold-plugging of USB printers working also when the usblp kernel module is loaded.
* Applied media type fix patch to HPLIP's HPIJS driver. As we switched back to HPIJS it turned out that the HP guys did not apply it (LP: #380858).
* system-config-printer: Make udev callout for Plug'n'Print take into account changes in USB printer URIs due to the new USB CUPS backend, so that no duplicate queues get auto-generated (LP: #448583).
* system-config-printer: Do not show the properties dialog when user accepts printing a test page after setting up a new print queue.
* Answered and triaged printing-related bug reports.
